question: Compare MacBook Pro M3 vs ThinkPad X1 for software development
expected_answer: MacBook Pro M3: Superior performance (ARM architecture), excellent battery (18h), premium build. ThinkPad X1: Better keyboard, easier repairs, Linux compatibility. Choose Mac for iOS dev, ThinkPad for flexibility.

question: Dell XPS 13 vs HP Spectre x360 - which has better display?
expected_answer: Both have excellent 13.4" displays. XPS 13: 1920x1200 IPS (500 nits), optional 4K OLED. Spectre x360: 1920x1280 IPS (400 nits), optional OLED. XPS 13 edges out with brighter base display and better color accuracy.
